Guard Chiperan:
I used to travel around the kingdom as a mercenary. The reason I came to Talking Island was because I was escorting a ship. But then I fell in love with the beauty of this island and put an end to my vagabond life.
Sunrise on the beach, the thick forest, and the magnificent waterfalls... You can t find a more beautiful place in Aden.
Ask the way to the waterfalls.
See the Lord and get the tax rate information.
Quest

Guard Chiperan:
Keep the mountain to your left, and walk until you come to a small river. If you follow the river upstream, you will come to the waterfalls, the river's source.
Orcs show up there frequently, so it is a bit dangerous, but the magnificent spectacle of the waterfall is worth the risk.
